content:
Hi, I made a data visualization website for RustSec Advisory Database. Maybe this website would be helpful for people to know what is the most common vulnerability. https://rsadv.lirui.tech/
微信截图_20211211203429.png
Looks nice. I'm guessing the chinese characters next to percentages mean something like "other"?
Yes, I have changed the language of the website to English. :)
It would be nice if it showed a message if javascript is disabled instead of showing a blank page.
The webpage is directly exported from Metabase, I may figure out a way to insert noscipt notice later. :)
